title: Azumanga Daioh (Azumanga Daioh: The Animation)
synopsis: Chiyo Mihama begins her high school career as one of the strangest students in her freshman classâ€”a tiny, 10-year-old academic prodigy with a fondness for plush dolls and homemade cooking. But her homeroom teacher, Yukari Tanizaki, is the kind of person who would hijack a student's bike to avoid being late, so "strange" is a relative word.
